Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.goblinskeep.entity.Entity
com.goblinskeep.entity.Player
public class Player extends Entity
Represents the player character in the game. The player can move, interact with objects, and collide with enemies.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final int
    screenX
    The player's screen position in the x-axis (centered).
    final int
    screenY
    The player's screen position in the y-axis (centered).

    • Player

      public Player(int startX, int startY, GamePanel gp, PlayerInputHandler PlayerInput)
      Constructs a Player entity with a starting position.
      Parameters:
      startX - The player's initial x-coordinate.
      startY - The player's initial y-coordinate.
      gp - The game panel.
      PlayerInput - Handles player input.

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

    • getCenterTileCoordinates

      public Point getCenterTileCoordinates()
      Gets the tile coordinates of the player's center hit-box position. This converts the player's world coordinates to tile-based coordinates.
      Returns:
      A Point containing the column (x) and row (y) of the tile where the player's hit-box center is located
